thread.title: Bengaluru shamed again! Biker sexually assaults air hostess in posh residential area, tears her top | Zee News
thread.title_full: Bengaluru shamed again! Biker sexually assaults air hostess in posh residential area, tears her top | Zee News

title: Bengaluru shamed again! Biker sexually assaults air hostess in posh residential area, tears her top | Zee News
text:
Bengaluru shamed again! Biker sexually assaults air hostess in posh residential area, tears her top By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 11:46 0 
Bengaluru: The famous IT city has been shamed yet again. 
In a shocking incident, an air hostess was allegedly sexually assaulted by a biker in Bengaluru. 
The biker who was wearing a full-face helmet shamelessly tore up the top of the air hostess before sexually assaulting her. 
The air hostess is a resident of HRBR Layout, a posh residential area. 
She and her friend were walking home after dinner at a nearby hotel when biker assaulted him. 
Reportedly, the incident had happened around 10 PM on February 12, police said, according to a report in TOI. 
After the sexual assault when she raised an alarm, the biker fled from the spot. 
The girl has sustained injuries. 
She has lodged a complaint two days later. 
FIR has been registered against unknown bikers who molested an air hostess on Feb 12th near HRBR layout at Banaswadi Police station. 
Earlier, Bengaluru was rocked by incident of mass molestation during new year's celebrations. Shocking CCTV footage showing molestation has sparked massive outrage. First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 11:34 More from zeenews
